label: Collectible Plates and Figurines
description: Market category for collectible plates and figurines.
intents: Find the value of a collectible plate or figurine.
Buy or sell collectible plates and figurines.
Learn about different types of collectible plates and figurines.

subcategories.label: Commemorative Plates
subcategories.description: Plates created to commemorate a specific event or person.

subcategories.label: Christmas Plates
subcategories.description: Plates designed for use during the Christmas season.

subcategories.label: Miniature Collectibles
subcategories.description: Small collectible items, often in the form of figurines or plates.
